meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unclear or indistinct.
meanings.sent1: The blurriness of the photo made it hard to recognize anyone in it.
meanings.sent2: She rubbed her eyes to clear the blurriness and see the road clearly.
meanings.sent3: The blurriness of his memory made him forget where he parked his car.
meanings.sent4: The blurriness of the situation left everyone feeling lost and confused.
meanings.sent5: The blurriness of the painting gave it a dream-like quality.

meanings.definition: A lack of sharpness or focus in an image or visual perception.
meanings.sent1: The blurriness of the TV screen made it hard to watch the movie.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the camera settings to reduce the blurriness in the photos.
meanings.sent3: The blurriness of the glasses made everything look like a watercolor painting.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was filled with blurriness after a long day of staring at the computer screen.
meanings.sent5: The blurriness of the landscape added a sense of mystery to the photograph.
